entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,595Chapters: 16/19Kudos: 582

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.” Stiles stares at him. “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?” “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away. Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: LIKE THUNDER BETWEEN LIGHTNING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,637Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 1

Summary: Following the defeat of the omega pack, Erica and Boyd reflect on their relationship, the pack bonds, and the nature of love. However, the fight is far from over and the pack has made many powerful enemies. With the return of Deucalion, a litany of revenge plots threaten the hopeful peace they'd found. High School is so complicated, even without the threat of death hanging above them.Or;The living room still smells like bleach. The bodies of Malcolm and Bonnie are buried out deep in the preserve. You take a sip of the soda from the theater and shake the ice around the bottom of the cup idly. “I have a really bad feeling,” you say as you walk up the stairs. You follow Boyd into his room and collapse on the bed.“You still stuck on the Marcie thing?” he asks, and you nod.“It's not just that, though. Something is coming… I just know it.”

entry.title: His Guardian Angel
entry.summary:
Author: sterektaboosmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,726Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: I've always had an overprotective streak when it comes to my younger brother, Stiles. He's as sweet as they come. Innocent as hell, or should I say, Heaven. He's in his first year of college, away from home, away from me. Surrounded by hundreds of horny students, waiting for the perfect time to take advantage of him. I know, because everyone wants him.If I didn't keep an eye on him, someone would take him, make him their own. And I can't let that happen. I have to make sure he stays pure, make sure he saves himself for a man that's worthy of him. But there's only one person who can take Stiles.He is mine, he just doesn't know it yet. He may be far from me, but I'm always watching over him. Like his guardian angel. Because I love him. And when he needs me, I need to make sure I'm there, ready for anything.No one will touch what's mine.Stiles won't let it.I won't let it.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,877Chapters: 28/75Kudos: 32

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: The Way He Looks At Me
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Cap

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,905Chapters: 1/8Kudos: 5

Summary: Derek Hale doesn’t know how to let people stay. Trauma taught him that love is dangerous, that opening the door only leads to more loss. First Hannah, then Laura. He’s still reeling, still holding himself together with frayed edges and silence.Stiles Stilinski doesn’t care. He shows up anyway, armed with too many questions, stubborn loyalty, and a steady presence Derek doesn’t know how to turn away. Somewhere between holding Derek up and keeping him grounded, Stiles falls in love.This is the story of Derek learning that healing is possible, that love can be safe, and that sometimes survival isn’t enough. Sometimes, you get to have more. And that people should be held accountable for their actions.

entry.title: Blood & Moonlight (IN PROGRESS)
entry.summary:
Author: MultiverseFandomGeek

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,786Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 27

Summary: When Hydra cloned Bucky Barnes during his Winter Soldier days, they never expected the twin experiments—Stiles and Stella—to survive. Raised in secret by a lonely sheriff in the supernatural hotspot of Beacon Hills, the twins grow up hunting monsters, dodging Hydra, and accidentally joining a werewolf pack. At 18, Hydra resurfaces, Bucky gets pardoned, and suddenly the Avengers are knee-deep in werewolf drama, teen angst, and illegal cloning. Oh—and Stiles might be mated to a grumpy alpha named Derek Hale. Super soldiers, werewolves, and family reunions? Just another Tuesday in Beacon Hills.

entry.title: LIKE THE COMING OF SPRING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,088Chapters: 20/36Kudos: 1

Summary: Three months after leaving to attend Berkeley, Stiles receives a phone call. Twelve years later; Stiles and Derek's son, Eli, is eager to help when a new enemy emerges. The nemeton has been quieted, but things never remain silent forever. When a demonic force threatens the peace in Beacon Hills, the Hale pack must prove that they are stronger than ever.Or;You are in the backyard, lying in the grass. The sun is high and hot. The light is painting the darkness behind your eyes into a vermillion. “You know what you have to do, right?” Laura asks. Last you saw she was filling a wading pool, but the water has stopped running through the hose and as she moves you can hear it sloshing around her shins.“No clue,” you answer. Laura laughs. You've missed that sound so much, and it makes you think about how long it took you after your family died to laugh again. “Last time we spoke you said my grief was too quiet… but it's been a while since I lost anyone.”You hear the water slosh two more times as she steps out of the pool. She walks over to you and stands so close to your arm that you can feel how cold the water is from her feet.“Who says grief must be fresh to be felt?”

entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 76,109Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 943

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.

entry.title: when is a wolf not a wolf?
entry.summary:
Author: laynie_addi

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,710Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 209

Summary: Stiles survives. He survives the murder of his childhood friend, ritual sacrifice, and being possessed by a demonic fox spirit. He survives his body being worn like a coat, his hands coated in the blood of countless innocent people. He survives being the reason the love of his best friends life is dead. And then what?Derek leaves. Scott spirals. His dad is busy cleaning up all the bodies and death and destruction that follows in Stiles's wake. He's got no one to turn to and no one in his corner.When is a wolf not a wolf? When it's a fox. When is Stiles not Stiles? When he's been left behind.or; what I wish had happened after the Nogitsune

entry.title: PANIC
entry.summary:
Author: my85volvo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,189Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 72

Summary: The first time Stiles felt Derek's hand around his throat, he panicked. Not the kind of panic that would normally come when you suddenly can't breathe, or see razor sharp teeth and glowing red eyes inches from your face, or feel pinpricks of clawed hands piercing your throat. It wasn't the kind of panic where he feared for his life. Stiles knew that Derek would never actually rip his throat out. He wasn't even grabbing hard enough to cut off air flow. It was weird to be pinned to the wall by an angry werewolf and feel safe, despite the overwhelming evidence that he was one snarky comment away from a bloody death. But Stiles knew, somehow. He just knew that Derek wouldn't hurt him.

entry.title: you are the moon that breaks the night (for which I have to howl)
entry.summary:
Author: ShieldOfIron

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,652Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 149

Summary: But whatever. It was all ok that Derek didn’t like him.Because wolf Derek? LOVED Stiles. Could not get enough. Danced around him with tail wagging and brought him gifts (the whole stag had been hard to bring home but he wasn’t complaining), and rolled over for belly rubs.Stiles didn’t always know he had a place in the pack but at least at the full moon he had a job, and keeping the alpha calm and his tail wagging was hardly work at all.He was the spark, the belly-rubber, the recipient of various play bites and of the most gorgeous sleep he’d ever had on the ground of the preserve, head pillowed on wolf Derek’s side as he drifted off mid-sentence.
